short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wish your friends “Happy Birthday” on autopilot! Use birthday marketing to keep relationships fresh and leads rolling in naturally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate beautiful, personalized birthday greetings on Facebook.

Set it and forget it. Let Brilliant Birthday go to work for you and never miss a birthday again. 

Nurture connections in a friendly and natural way to keep you and your business at the top of their minds. 

Reach out to your Facebook contacts with birthday posts, messages, images, special offers, etc. Automatically reach out to them before, after, and on their birthday. 

Use this tool for personal or business use to make your friends and connections feel special and remembered. 

Grow your business on Facebook with the help of this quick-to-set-up and easy to use tool.
